overview: Elder Ivy has a rebellious spirit for a Mormon. He's always been naturally lean and strong and has been able to parlay that into getting what he wants. Entering his mission, he intends to take his place as top dog. He can't help being aggressive and horny, nor does he want to. He's young and hot and he's going to take every opportunity to gratify himself. As with any missionary, he knows the rules about sex. He just takes great joy in secretly breaking them. In fact, the fact that its forbidden just makes him want it more. The secret Order of the Higher Priesthood sees great potential in this wild boy they just need to break him in first.
title: Elder Ivy: Chapters 1-4
